WorkItem.Description:
I have had a read trying to find some info on this problem but i cant see it anywhere i could possibly be blind perhaps
I add my character into Rawr, load it from the armory, but in the main screen it shows that i am under exp cap.
Is it a coincidence that I am 8 exp short which I get from a talent, is it possible that its not adding the exp I gain from the talent Unleashed Rage?
Because it thinks I'm short Expertise its telling me to gem / reforge into expertise to get me up to the cap.
WorkItem.Summary: [Enhance] Expertise Cap not Factoring Unleashed Rage Talent

Comments.Message: Not seeing this on other characters. You haven't provided your Region/Realm/Character Name so we can check the behaviour.
Please follow the Posting Guidelines and provide all of the information we need to fix your issue. This includes armory import information and/or character.xml file.

Sorry about that

Realm: Blackrock ( US)
Character Name: Riktahs

have attached my xml file also

Sorry it took so long for me to get to this.  Somehow went under my radar.

Loading your character in from battle net, I am showing you with 24 Expertise.  This is comprised of 503 expertise rating and 8 expertise.  Removing points from Unleashed Rage reduces it to 16/14 Expertise (503 expertise rating and 0/4 expertise).  So Unleashed rage is being factored in to the calculations.

The dodge cap is 26 expertise, or 541 rating for shamans, so you are 38 rating under the cap.
well im not sure why rawr is missing some stats because in game  + on the wow armory i am capped so im not sure

Ok, looking at you .xml and your battle net profile (which are different).  The problem is with the star chaser's belt.  It has randomly generated stats, which is currently not supported in Rawr.

This means that there happen to be no stats on your belt (and hence no reforge).  You will have to manually edit them in.
ahh that makes sense now, thank you have fixed it now and all fine, thank you again
